titleStmt.title: The articles and conditions of the perpetuall peace concluded between the most potent King of Spaine, &c. on the one partie, and the high and mightie Lords, the States Generall of the Vnited Netherlands, on the other partie, subscribed and sealed the 13th. of Ianuary, 1648. At Munster.
titleStmt.author: Philip IV, King of Spain, 1605-1665. aut
United Provinces of the Netherlands. Staten Generaal. aut

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed at Rotterdam by Haest van Voortganck, printer of the Articles of the Peace, 1648. And reprinted at London by Robert White,

notesStmt.note: Signed: The Earl of Peneranda [and 8 others].
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library, Washington, D.C..

person.persName: Haest van Voortganck, printer of the Articles of the Peace
